gmd:MD_Metadata.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd/gmd.xsd http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco/gco.xsd http://www.opengis.net/gml http://www.opengis.net/gml/gml.xsd http://www.hrwallingford.co.uk/mim/1.0 schema/mim/mim.xsd

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Meso-NH version 4.9.3 Meso-NH is a non-hydrostatic mesoscale atmospheric model jointly developed by the Laboratoire d'Aérologie (UMR 5560 UPS/CNRS) and by CNRM/GAME (URA 1357 CNRS/Météo-France). The model is built around a dynamical core, an ensemble of packages treating different physical processes in the atmosphere, and an ensemble of pre-processing and post-processing tools. This instance covers north-western Italy. The model is used with a 1km-horizontal resolution. It is initialized and forced with the ECMWF operational large-scale forecasts from 04/11/2011 00 UTC, and produces a 24h high-resolution forecast.

mim:description.gco:CharacterString: Digital Terrain Model (~1km resolution)
Soil texture (~10km resolution)
Soil texture (~10km resolution)

Physiographic surface parameters (~1km resolution) which includes more than 50 parameters (such as albedo, emissivity, leaf area index, root depth, building height and shape,…) pre-computed for 151 different ecosystems from vegetation and land cover maps.
Large-scale meteorological fields (Model Orography)- Provide Meso-NH initial conditions
Large-scale meteorological fields (land/sea mask)- Provide Meso-NH initial conditions
Large-scale meteorological fields (Surface pressure)- Provide Meso-NH initial conditions
Large-scale meteorological fields (Surface temperature)- Provide Meso-NH initial conditions
Large-scale meteorological fields (Surface moisture)- Provide Meso-NH initial conditions
Large-scale meteorological fields (Deep soil temperature)- Provide Meso-NH initial conditions
Large-scale meteorological fields- Provide Meso-NH initial conditions
Large-scale meteorological fields (Upper-air zonal wind)- Provide Meso-NH initial conditions
